Reviews.Title: does not work
Reviews.Author: x "angelmom"
Reviews.Content: this camera shuts off for no reason. the battery compartment cover broke off the first day i had it, chintzy. the video mode does not work at all (and yes i have a 8g memory card installed) it runs through batteries very quickly. it takes 3-5 seconds to take a picture after you press the shutter button down. i paid $27 dollars for this camera and it it not even worth that price.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for my mom....
Reviews.Author: Butch "whatevva"
Reviews.Content: My mom is not very wise when it comes to tech stuff, so a digital camera was risky.She's doing very well with it!The only problem it that it ALWAYS defaults to flash off, and every time she turns the camera on, she has to enable the flash.

Reviews.Title: The battery cover immediately broke.
Reviews.Author: Evelyn R. Powers
Reviews.Content: We had it open and working for less than an hour (off and on) when it started acting wonky. We switched out batteries and the battery cover broke. This inexpensive camera is also lousy and cheap. Avoid it like the plague.

Reviews.Title: Ok for the price.
Reviews.Author: NannyRachel
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a starter digital camera for a 10 year old. Disappointed that the camera battery door broke immediately. It has to be snapped back in every time the battery compartment is opened. The camera works fine and takes decent pictures. A decent value for the price, but you need to be gentle with it.

Reviews.Title: Gift for my niece
Reviews.Author: tammy steinkamp
Reviews.Content: Prompt and perfect! This camera was a hit with a 10 year old for her first camera.  It does seem to consume batteries though.

Reviews.Title: Vivitar 12.1MP HD Digital Camera with 2.4-Inch LCD VT324-STRAWBERRY Vivitar
Reviews.Author: vab
Reviews.Content: I am not a "camera" person.  I wanted an inexpensive digital camera and use a memory card to enable me to take photos once in while to be included as e-mail attachments.  So this is okay for me because I have no experience with this technology.
